title: Sports On The Air for Tuesday, Oct. 20
text:
Sports On The Air for Tuesday, Oct. 20 
Today 
1 p.m., ALCS Game 4: Kansas City Royals at Toronto Blue Jays, FS1. 
4:30 p.m., NLCS Game 3: New York Mets at Chicago Cubs, TBS. 
College Football 
5 p.m., Louisiana-Lafayette at Arkansas State, ESPN2. 
Basketball 
5 p.m., Minnesota Timberwolves at Milwaukee Bucks, NBATV. 
7:30 p.m., Golden State Warriors at Los Angeles Clippers, ESPN. 
Hockey 
4:30 p.m., Dallas Stars at Philadelphia Flyers, NBCSN. 
Soccer 
11:30 a.m., UEFA Champions League: Bayer Leverkusen vs. AS Roma, ESPN2. 
11:30 a.m., UEFA Champions Leauge: FC Dynamo Kyiv vs. Chelsea, ROOT. 
Golf 
6 p.m., World Long Drive Championship Semifinals, GLF. 
Wednesday 
1 p.m., ALCS Game 5: Kansas City Royals at Toronto Blue Jays, FS1. 
5 p.m., NLCS Game 4: New York Mets at Chicago Cubs, TBS. 
Soccer 
11:30 a.m., UEFA Champions League: Morussia Monchengladbach at Juventus, ESPN2. 
11:30 a.m., UEFA Champions League: Sevilla at Manchester City, ROOT. 
7 p.m., Women’s Exhibition: Brazil at United States, ESPN. 
Hockey 
5 p.m., Philadelphia Flyers at Boston Bruins, NBCSN. 
Volleyball 
7:30 p.m., Women: Washington at Stanford, Pac-12 Net. 
Golf 
6 p.m., World Long Drive Championship Semifinals, GLF. 
Thursday 
5:25 p.m., Seattle Seahawks at San Francisco 49ers, CBS/NLF Net. 
Baseball 
5 p.m., NLCS Game 5 (if necessary): New York Mets at Chicago Cubs, TBS. 
Soccer 
7:50 a.m., UEFA Europa League: Borussia Dortmund at Qabala, FS1. 
10 a.m., UEFA Europa League: Tottenham at Anderlecht, FS1. 
Noon, UEFA Europa League: Rubin Kazan at Liverpool, FS1. 
7 p.m., Women’s College: Stanford at Washington State, Pac-12 Net. 
College Football 
4 p.m., Temple at East Carolina, ESPN2. 
6 p.m., California at UCLA, ESPN. 
Hockey 
7 p.m., Washington Capitals at Vancouver Canucks, CSNNW. 
Golf 
2 p.m., PGA Shriners Hospirals for Children Open, GLF. 
8:30 p.m., LPGA Taiwan Championship, GLF. Rules for posting comments
